attributes.action: Stop the plans for the animal testing facility and virus lab palnned for Camden alongside St Pancras International. The lab is opposed locally and has been criticised at governmemt level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are plans to build an animal testing lab and virus containment facility in Camden alongside St Pancras Intenational. MI5 leaked security fears to newspapers and the lab is opposed locally. Foot and Mouth disease was leaked from a similar government facility in Pirbright Surrey. The Camden lab idea is avery real threat and should be opposed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
